title: Quantifying future carbon emissions uncertainties under stochastic modeling and Monte Carlo simulation: Insights for environmental policy consideration for the Belt and Road Initiative Region
content:

Source: Journal of Environmental Management, Volume 370

Author(s): Seidu Abdulai Jamatutu, Kashif Abbass, Sidique Gawusu, Kyei Emmanuel Yeboah, Issahaku Abdul-Moomin Jamatutu, Huaming Song
